meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of documents.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer requested all documental evidence for the case.
meanings.sent2: The documental folder contained important papers.
meanings.sent3: The documental paperwork was neatly organized in the file cabinet.
meanings.sent4: Her documental approach to research impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The documental records were meticulously kept for future reference.

meanings.definition: A film or television program presenting factual information about a subject.
meanings.sent1: The documental on wildlife conservation was informative.
meanings.sent2: We watched a fascinating documental about space exploration.
meanings.sent3: The documental about penguins made us laugh with their antics.
meanings.sent4: The documental on ancient civilizations was a journey through time.
meanings.sent5: The documental captured the essence of the artist's life beautifully.
